other_tests.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
other_tests.findings: The appendix is fluid filled, measuring 11 mm at its greatest width and 7 to 8 mm near its tip, with minimal surrounding stranding. Prominent mesenteric lymph nodes present, although none meet criteria for pathologic enlargement. The sigmoid colon, descending colon, and transverse colon are mostly collapsed, with a moderate to large fecal load in the ascending colon.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In comparison to the prior exam from ___, the dilation of the appendix has slightly increased.
